name: Yell Out for Survival
description:
Yell Out for Survival is an indie game called Yell Out for Survival that covers many genres including Runner, Adventure, and turn-base battle. In the whole game, the player is able to completely control/command a character with voice(audio) input. The game is separated into stages, each stage presenting a different type of experience with different goals to achieve. It aims to provide users with a playable interactive experience

The game will be developed by Unity engine that processes the audio input from a microphone attached to the computer. The game is divided into multiple stages and each stage will have a largely different art style. The story will happen in the prehistoric age, in which our character will be originally created by ourselves, and it will live from deep ocean to forest as it evolves. The character combines many different animals’ features to reveal its characteristics in different evolutionary stages.
